lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: I generally consider myself a charitable person, but I don't like giving things to people who haven't earned them. Kiva allows me to remain true to my personal principles while empowering individuals in developing countries to create change in themselves
lender.occupational_info: I study at Claremont McKenna College, a small liberal arts school in Southern California.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I know the difference a small loan can make after traveling in Nepal and India. Small business start-ups have a lot of integrity and determination to make a living for their families it puts some of us to shame!
lender.occupational_info: I am a cook by trade and at present run my own chai business out of my home in Vermont

lender.name: Helder
lender.loan_because: I think that instead of subsiding, we have to fight poverty with initiative. Together we are more, we are stronger.
lender.occupational_info: Well... a guy who likes share knowledge. Higher education in IT applications on Chemical Engineering Problems. As a teacher, since I like sharing knowledge... you know, sharing is about giving along while you receive. Right?

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel so good I almost feel guilty - I can't think of anything with such a return for so little effort.
lender.occupational_info: I write short stories, novels and movies.

lender.name: Hunter & Suzanne
lender.loan_because: we can't move a mountain but we cn help push.
lender.occupational_info: Map making & Conservation

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I help people get stronger after they hurt themselves

lender.name: Milton
lender.loan_because: My small contribution to small businesses can have a huge impact on the lives of many

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: helping those in need brings warmth to myself and a future for those who need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: there is nothing better than giving back, and helping others find their dream home is extremely fulfilling.

lender.name: KdgnCivicHouseASP
lender.loan_because: Service Learning Project
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: David and Valerie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others and it is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: As a social worker, I help abused and neglected children to learn to be positive, overcome challenges and to free themselves from the pain they have experienced. Valerie as a teacher promotes among children positive attitude and a good self-esteem.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: We believe people will pay back the loans and grow their businesses even more because of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Defense Department building radars

lender.name: sharad pawar
lender.loan_because: I believe that business is one of the strongest ways to enable social change.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I am on the board of Micro Business Development, a large microlender in Denver, and through this experience I have come to realize the power of microfinance and believe wholeheartedly that it is one of the best tools we have to change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the buying and selling of assets for a large media and communications company.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I lost my son in 2005, he was only 23 yo and this is something that I do in memory of him. He was always concerned for those less fortunate, loved the underdog so i think he would approve! Update Dec 2011 Mum passed away a week before Christmas and so I added some loans in her honour - clothing and jewellery, her favourite things!

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: it's a way to make my donations go much further - a good way for anyone who wants to help but can't spare much. And it helps people become self-sufficient - the more people we can raise out of critical need, the more there is to go around when a need arises.

lender.name: Waddah
lender.loan_because: As a human, I feel that I am obligated to help my follow human being; who needs my help in time of need.
lender.occupational_info: I would like not to comment on this question. Thanks

lender.name: Gita and Sonny
lender.loan_because: We believe in sustainable development by empowering people to move out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Empowerment.

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: General merchandise wholesale business

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: personal success is empowering
lender.occupational_info: I study economics and international finance

lender.name: craig
lender.loan_because: taken a gamble and invested their time and money in me and my personal dreams. I am willing to do the same through Kiva because I understand just important it is to know that others believe in you and your personal goals. I also think that in a global community it's important to help your neighbors- even if they reside behind another border. Thank you Kiva for giving me the opportunity to help!
lender.occupational_info: I am a working artist and student of the humanities

lender.name: Sally-Ann
lender.loan_because: it seems like such a small thing to do, yet it helps someone lift themselves out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: Creative Director for a marketing and retail promotions company

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference in someones life.

lender.name: craig
lender.loan_because: I think there is a need to let the world know all Americans aren't self centered.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a carpenter.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I hope my little bit of money will make a big difference in the life of someone who is probably working very hard.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from my job as a newspaper reporter but continue working as a volunteer. My husband and I raised our four children on a dairy farm. I am now a widow with five grandchildren and live alone with my dog, Kita.

lender.name: Vlad
lender.loan_because: I'm a business owner in Massachusetts. I know how it is to have an idea and not have the funds for it just when you need it the most. It's funny how the banks won't give money to those that need it the most, but it is available to those who have plenty. So why not help those people that banks refuse. =)
lender.occupational_info: A home improvement business concentrating on advanced gutter protection systems.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: there but for the grace of god, go I
lender.occupational_info: I pay my bills as a graphic designer; I pay my soul by creating jewelry.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.occupational_info: I work on political campaigns for people who run for government office.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: All of our brothers and sisters around the world should have the privlage of living a decent life.
lender.occupational_info: environment, health, and safety

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: My life has been extraordinarily blessed and through Kiva, I hope to share what wealth I can with those making an effort to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage work across multiple businesses.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I work in Latin America and see what a difference a little money can make. Just the cost of a couple weeks worth of lattes can make huge difference to people elsewhere.

lender.name: Jeraldeen
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place - one step at a time.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My mother and I were very poor
lender.occupational_info: Helping people make money

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: it is the best possible solution to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student, I study at a university.

lender.name: NDonnelly
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves a chance to achieve a goal they set in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn about saving money to ensure they can weather the rough patches in their life.

lender.name: Charles & Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to succeed. Sometimes it just takes the faith of a stranger turned friend!
lender.occupational_info: I mix medicines that help sick people feel better.

lender.name: C.K. Sidhu
lender.loan_because: It all adds up.

lender.name: MoneyLender
lender.loan_because: I can get my money back... its not charity.
lender.occupational_info: I make money.

lender.name: Roy W.
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their dreams of expanding or starting a small business. Kiva provides a vehicle to make this happen and a certain level of confidence for the participants.
lender.occupational_info: I love working on challenges that are computer related. I am unsure what I would do if they were not around...maybe a mechanic like my father. I have always liked to troubleshoot things.

lender.name: Frank and Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: The lines on the map aren't real. We are all one on our journey on this planet.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org makes me an offer that I can't refuse.
lender.occupational_info: I spent my whole life trying not to be careless.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.occupational_info: I sell automotive tools.

lender.name: Peter Basso & Family
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to extend my hand in friendship to those whom have enough initiative to be self employed in a tough world.
lender.occupational_info: Besides having a law degree, I we tend to 400 organic appletrees in Northern California. I also have a daughter who is 18, and a son who is 14. That's his handsome face in the display picture, he's attempting to eat our dog....:)

lender.name: Manuel
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language to corporate students in Portugal

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: I was given a loan years ago to accomplish my dream. These hard working,good people deserve the same opportunity. How wonderful that I can help!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who have had surgery.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of human beings; their desire to improve their lives and their desire to provide better opportunities for their children. I believe is the responsibility of each individual to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Evaluation and treatment of the criminally insane.

lender.name: Roderik
lender.loan_because: I can and I want it..

lender.name: Remco
lender.loan_because: I think this is a beautiful way of helping fellow entrepreneurs help themselves, in a very personal way.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business, I am a designer and webdeveloper. I design and program websites and help other businesses with their identity and communication. I am also a co-founder of a charity: www.steppingstonesforafrica.org

lender.name: Diogo
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the national railways. My job deals with all environmental issues that may arise due to the construction, operation and maintenance of railways in Portugal.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is a way to reach out and help someone who is trying to improve their life.

lender.name: Tiago
lender.loan_because: i live in a part of the world where people have a overall good quality of live. This is just a tinny little thing i can do to balance world money distribution.
lender.occupational_info: i create software, not the best job i could ever imagine, but i need someway of earning money, and its not that bad afterall...

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Teatcher/researcher.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to...

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: Acredito que posso fazer a diferen√ßa..

lender.name: Alisa & Lane
lender.loan_because: Because we are also small business owners.

lender.name: Marya
lender.loan_because: it's important to me to help others realize their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher.

lender.name: Micky
lender.loan_because: The Kiva model simply works. My wife and I travel the world on a frequent basis and the need for micro-loans is more crucial than ever!

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: It can make a big impact on someones life.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: For the past 5 years I have owned and operated a small, home-based business. I understand how a small amount of money can make a big difference to people running their own businesses. I have been blessed with success and want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I create art on my computer and then print it onto clothing (shirts, hats, etc.). I then sell the items I create online and in my small retail store.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want others to succeed in controlling their own destiny.

lender.name: Betty
lender.occupation: Notetaker for a student who is a quadraplegic

lender.name: Jarleif
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the possibilities.....

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help, even if only in a small way. I'm a single parent and am especially interested in helping other moms.
lender.occupational_info: I work in online education.

lender.name: luisgalveias
lender.loan_because: I want to give a chance to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Back in my country I also support entrepreneurs raising capital to their projects.

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur active in the internet & technology sector.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I understand the value of a dollar
lender.occupational_info: I am studying agriculture

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: Money is love!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life.

lender.name: Filipe Silva Guerra
lender.loan_because: Helping people to improve their life¬¥s and set an example to my children.

lender.name: Laura Lana
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like to see other people's ideas; I browse the site even when I am not lending. Of course it always feels good when I am able to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work almost every day at a restaurant but I prefer to think of myself as a homemaker!

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: I think we all have the need to help and Kiva is a real path. Giving out money will never solve the world's poverty, supporting entrepreneurs may have a chance...

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can make a difference and help someone improve his/her life.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Everyone whom I know already has enough (too-much) "stuff". In the part of the world in which I live we're driven to acquire more and more. I have been blessed to travel internationally and I have come to appreciate those cultures where family and community are "what matters". This is a way in which I can contribute to people of those cultures. Hopefully I can continue to pass it on, a few entrepeneurs at a time. My intention is to add a few more gifts each year and to never stop passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: My mission in life is: "to create loving, caring, and supportive communities by honoring the diversity and similarities amongst all peoples."

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all deserve a chance to thrive.

lender.name: Joanna & Kim
lender.loan_because: We want to help end world poverty.

lender.name: Yelena
lender.occupation: Technical Recruiter for a consulting company
lender.loan_because: because budget is a huge challenge to meet but should not be the stopping block on the way of the talent and guts of these entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I discover and hire technical and business consultants for my company. I am also working on my masters degree in Industrial/Organizational Psychology

lender.name: Rui Filipe
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Heman
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested about how the future is represented in various ways through the imagination of individuals. This is where my work is located.

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women to porvide the best life for themselves. their friends and their families. I am particularly interested in helping those women who by receiving these loans will be able to provide education for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I run a medical device company in North America which sells blood collection tubes to hospitals and physicians offices for diagnostic purposes. The tubes are specifically designed for use in newborns, children and cancer patients.

lender.name: Hermann
lender.loan_because: I believe if we are in a position to help others, we have an obligation to do so. Thanks to Kiva, making a difference is that easy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the founder of TUXAMOON, a political, cultural and social platform.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: My long term goal is to be an entrepreneur. I believe helping others establish their businesses is a great investment. It warms my heart to know that the little money I donate helps someone's dream become a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I sale designer clothing in a store.

lender.name: VALICIA
lender.loan_because: I love to make a difference! This is a way I can help make the world a more beautiful place in every way.
lender.occupational_info: So much fun! I just love what I do.

lender.name: Helen and Simon
lender.loan_because: We want to help provide opportunities to individuals who dream big and work hard.

lender.name: B√°rbara
lender.loan_because: To contribute to build a better world.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Polonca
lender.loan_because: My husband and I own a small business. We want to help other people set up businesses and improve their lives.

lender.name: Francis Almeida
lender.loan_because: It allows those who will not get funded through commerical banks a chance to access funds that allows them a chance to make a life for themselves and their families. We need to help our fellow human beings have a chance at a better life.

lender.name: Pedia
lender.loan_because: Our staff is made up of caring people who want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Our company works to improve the health of all people, by working with other companies to make better medicines for everyone.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I read an interview with Moses, an MFI representative in Uganda. He explained how the poorest of the poor do not think of tomorrow because they are so focused on the next morsel they can get for their families. For these people there is no tomorrow, only the challenge of surviving today. These small Kiva loans have so dramatically changed the lives of some people, Moses said "they now think of tomorrow." Can you give someone anything better than tomorrow?

lender.name: Chris Bitler
lender.loan_because: "It makes a difference to someone else!"
lender.occupational_info: I work as an internal auditor for the consumer goods company Church & Dwight (Arm & Hammer, Trojan, OxiClean, etc.). I dabble around on the internet in my spare time - buying domains and tinkering with web sites and blogs.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe that your quality of life shouldn't be determined by the birth country lottery. Hard-working people given the opportunity can succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I design parts of the phone system.

lender.name: Ruschele
lender.loan_because: It just feels good to help those that are trying to help themselves. We all need to help each other out!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a paper pusher!!!!

lender.name: Vasco
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world with more opportunities for people that want to do and change their lifes!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a portfolio manager for Pension Funds and Funds of Funds.

lender.name: Dean / Gail
lender.loan_because: We care for people.
lender.occupational_info: We enable people to love God and others.

lender.name: 4th Hour Sociology
lender.loan_because: We want to help others succeed and make our overhead projector proud.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to!

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I owe

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I guess it makes me feel that we really can make a difference.

lender.name: SocialSoundSystem
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to succeed in a world that has been systematically opposed to developing nations. Damn the Man. Save the Empire.
lender.occupational_info:
My work is not my life; my work simply supports the life I live.
I love music in all shapes and forms.
I don't want to travel the world... I NEED TO TRAVEL THE WORLD!
You got a couch I could sleep on?

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. We can do so much, with so little. As I have traveled around the world I become more aware of the waste that goes on in the United States. Less fortunate countries/people need so little to make a huge difference in their lives....we should all help.

lender.name: Zahra
lender.loan_because: to eliminate poverty in the world

lender.name: JestPaint.com
lender.occupation: Face Painter and Owner of JestPaint.com
lender.loan_because:
I want to help other small businesses grow around the world. My husband and I decided to increase our loans to Kiva by adding a portion of our sales from our face paint store to our account.
We have to be creative when coming up with ways to make a difference in the world.
We are thankful for other face painters who support our store, and inkind support Kiva Lenders!
lender.occupational_info: I paint faces and whole bodies for private and public events. I also teach face painting and selling face paints to other artists.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a shot at success, whatever that means to them. For the entrepreneurs asking for assistance here I am very happy to be able to help.

lender.name: Laetitia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to make a living in tough circumstances
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I am a one-man business, too

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Because I know that someone needs the money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: Civil Engineer

lender.name: Ann G
lender.loan_because: It has always been my dream to start a small business. With this donation I am helping someone to take that step and fly.
lender.occupational_info: Investigate factories to ID and prevent worker exposure to hazardous chemicals or noise.

lender.name: 5th Hour Sociology
lender.loan_because: We would like to help others succeed.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I am in elementry school and want to help other people. I also want others to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: a student in the 3rd grade

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: Se posso, devo ajudar. If I can, I must.

lender.name: Racquel
lender.loan_because: that is what we should do for one another... help someone become better.

lender.name: Francisco CR
lender.loan_because: I like Kiva lender motivation

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I was given an opportunity to start my own business and things have been going very well for me and my family. I hope that by helping out someone to get started that they can have the same satisfaction and fulfillment I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I complete environmental assessments and remediation projects in the oil and gas industry in the province of Alberta, Canada

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: I was given a KIVA g.c as a gift...which keeps on giving. This is a wonderful opportunity to reach out to those with aspirations who just need a little boost to fulfill them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small, family owned, neighborhood tavern that provides great food and spirits to a wide variety of people. Our friendly family atmosphere has earned us a reputation that people have loved and respected for 40 years. Although I have only been a part of it for 12 years, I have met many wonderful people from all over the world and found that everyone has a little kindness in their heart to share.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to try to do my small part to make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Didier
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: LILA
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a fighting chance.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurs of the World in a responsible, sustainable fashion.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Finance/Asset Management, researching investment opportunities with a focus on emerging markets.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and the capacity for us to do good as a world force.
lender.occupational_info: NASA scientist

lender.name: 7th Hour Sociology
lender.loan_because: We want to help others.

lender.name: Terry
lender.occupational_info: Portrait Photographer and fine art photographer of Europe & Central America. Also photography tours in Central America & Europe

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: It opens my heart and brings simple joy.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in body work for all ages and medical needs.

lender.name: Merek
lender.loan_because: I once spoke with my parents about how I joined this program, and I referred to Kiva and loans as investments.. My mom quickly corrected me in calling a loan an investment, because Kiva loans have no interest, but that made me realize how much more of a investment this really is. Kiva has truly surpassed all limitations of monetary and materialistic values...

lender.name: Lisa E. Dunn
lender.loan_because: It brings me pleasure and happiness assisting someone else to achieve your fullest potential and purpose in their individual life.
lender.occupational_info: An entrepreneur that provides life coaching, personal and virtual assistant services.

lender.name: Brian & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel good attempting to make a difference.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for small business and am inspired by the spirit of the people who engage in such ventures.
lender.occupational_info: I assist with the development of many small businesses under the umbrella of a larger corporation.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am blessed that i am in a position to be able to lend through Kiva. It feels good to know that even in a small way I am helping make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: As Director, Global Promotions & Branded Foods I am responsible for the implementation of promotions and branded foods in the United States. I am also responsible for the approval of licensee television advertising on a global basis.

lender.name: Mary Kathryn
lender.occupational_info: I work in the biotechnology pharmaceutical field, providing medical information to health care professionals and patients regarding our products.

lender.name: Nobrega Real Estate
lender.loan_because: We believe that helping people help themselves is the best way to make a lasting improvement and lift the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: We are real estate agents in the San Francisco East Bay area. For each transaction we close we make a Kiva donation and loan to an entrepreneur. It is our way of taking our success and helping someone else succeed as well.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping someone out if I can.

lender.name: Jocelyne
lender.loan_because: I can help almost directly someone else to get a better life

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: My loan will go directly to the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with the online service they purchased which is access to movies and pictures of models they like.

lender.name: Queen of the Click
lender.loan_because: I love that people have dreams & it's fun to help them get to fulfill dreams. It's awesome to see the successes that people around the world are having with just a little bit of help and their own determination. Somedays when I am having a bad day, I come on Kiva and it feels great to help others make their dreams come true. My website is here: http://www.queenoftheclick.com
lender.occupational_info: Kiva allows everyone a chance to realize they can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I love to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I save childrens lives.

lender.name: Matthew A. Cercone
lender.loan_because: There is a NEED and I am able to afford sharing what financial means that I have available to give-back what others have given to me --- personal PAY-BACK.
lender.occupational_info: I am RETIRED and enjoying what GOD has provided to "me" in this environment and life-time.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: YOUR GOD LOVES YOU!
lender.occupational_info: I keep the Peace

lender.name: Buck and Billie
lender.loan_because: God has been good to us. We wish to help others. Helping people help themselves makes us happy.
lender.occupational_info: Buck makes sure the big equipment that fixes the railroad track is ready to run. Billie helps teams of people improve the way their work is completed.

lender.name: Tore
lender.loan_because: it is an exiting way to contribute to other peoples lives and possibilities.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate search and rescue-operations when someone is in distress at sea in the air or on land

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Making a difference in someone's life has always been my joy. I am so happy to be able to help so many wonderful people, who through no fault of their own are not as blessed as we are. My lifetime goal is to know that "My life mattered and that I made a difference" Kiva has really helped me to fulfill this goal. "I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still can do something. I will not refuse to do the something I can do" Helen Keller
lender.occupational_info: I was a finance executive in the film industry for 40 years. I retired 2 years ago and now live in Santa Barbara California with my life partner.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, I want to pay it forward for all the times I was helped by others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non profit insurance company. I get to pay providers for the health care they give to the less fortunate in my community. I am proud of the work I do.

lender.name: Mariana Malta
lender.loan_because: I deeply believe in micro-credit as a tool against poverty!
lender.occupational_info: Web technologies/ Information Management

lender.name: Agus
lender.loan_because: others have been so generous towards me.
lender.occupational_info: I treat water so it is healthy to drink.

lender.name: Peggy & Patty
lender.loan_because: We were brought up in a loving famiy that taught the value of hard work. As business owners ourselves we want our business as well as others to succeed. And then there's Karma.
lender.occupational_info: We look at real estate titles and check the history of them ro make sure that the title is good and point out any defects.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Capital is what some people lack in capitalism. Kiva is a win-win.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I learn!

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: I believe people are capable of so much when given the opportunity and I know that I have the power to give people that opportunity.

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.loan_because: I'm building my own "dream" business now. I realize the struggle and the satisfaction. Hopefully I can in some small way help people to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone. I have a lot to be grateful for and for this reason I want to give back to those who may not have had the opportunities that I have had living in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able.
lender.occupational_info: Fire Chief

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to invest in other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Obopay offers everyone the ability to send and receive money from their mobile phone!

lender.name: FAB Women
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate in our lives and wish to share our good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of professional women who meet once per month for lunch to support each other in our careers, decisions, dilemmas, and as friends.

lender.name: Susanna
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to live in dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I help smart children from all around the world reach their academic potential.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are driven and determined to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Manager of a store that supplies everything needed to paint cars, trucks, boats etc.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world and Kiva makes it so easy to do it for persons of more modest incomes!

lender.name: Paulo Pires
lender.loan_because: in this greedy world, every effort towards the less fortunate is important
lender.occupational_info: I try to give those 0's and 1's inside computers some meaningful purpose to their ephemeral lives.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupation: studying to be a personal trainer
lender.occupational_info: studying to help those lose weight, to be healthy active people :)

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you just have to have a chance... and it feels wonderfull when it finally arrives.
lender.occupational_info: I've writen and directed for television, and shorts for cinema. I'm now embrassing my first feature film. My goal is one: touch audiences and share emotions with them about human nature.

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: I believe that it's everyone's duty to give a little help to improve the life of those who work hard for it! And also because I believe that if everyone helps we can achieve a better world.

lender.name: Addy
lender.loan_because: I am learning what it means to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I play and go to school. My mom and dad make me do chores around the house...sometimes I help with my baby sister.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: helping small businesses provides security which makes for a more peaceful world.

lender.name: flags
lender.loan_because: We are committed to helping different communities from around the world achieve the standard of living that everyone deserves. For more information visit our website www.fiu.edu/~flags
lender.occupational_info: Flags is a students‚Äô initiative that started as a project for the Honors College at FIU. The main purpose of such project is to foster in our society a greater sense of solidarity for communities from around the world that experience hardships of different kinds, and with which we don‚Äôt necessarily identify from a cultural point of view. In this way, the members of Flags, and all those who contribute with our cause, offer immediate support to such communities and demonstrate that by sharing our time and our resources‚Äîeven if it is only a small portion‚Äîwe can have a great positive impact in the wellbeing of others who need it. For more info visit our website www.fiu.edu/~flags

lender.name: Ronen
lender.loan_because: it's good for the Karma.... :-)

lender.name: Koren
lender.loan_because: I want to help. While traveling in countries where Kiva partners lend I met so many hard working people that I wanted to help but it was logistically difficult. This is such a simple way to make a really profound difference to someone. I am grateful for the opportunity to share in someone else's success.

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: operating a small business on my own i can appreciate the need for help to get on there own and support them fully in their quest to take care of themsevles and family andnot rely on the government for help

lender.name: Lura
lender.loan_because: we want to empower people to be the best that they can be
lender.occupational_info: we have a small charity that we have set up that involves friends keeping a small jar by their night table and dropping spare change into it, this way the money is not missed but it adds up and is used to make loans

lender.name: intention
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: Grrr rrrrr ruff!
lender.occupational_info: pant pant pant

lender.name: Duard
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are in need and I think that is great. I think everybody who can should loan.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: there are a lot of people out there that need a little help now and again. If I can help get someone get back on their feet while Im able to continue standing on mine then I will do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Aircraft Rescue Firefighter. I am immidate response to any aircraft emergencies that come in on the various airfields I work on around the world.

lender.name: Sultan
lender.loan_because: I care. I've been lucky to have more than I need. I'd like to help others reach their goals and needs.

lender.name: Celina
lender.loan_because: My family never had money growing up, so I joined the army to support my mom and siblings. Now that I make good money I want to help out others in need.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting women owned businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate and execute merchandise presentation and perform inventory management duties for both accessory and apparel companies.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because:
I am lucky. Born into a loving family and safe community, I have been fortunate enough to always have food to eat, a roof over my head, and access to fantastic educational oppurtunities.
I hope that through these loans lives will be improved. Every child and adult for that matter, deserves these things: food, shelter, safety, family, and education. Peace be with you : )
lender.occupational_info: At this point in my life, I attend school each day learning as much as I can. For money, I take care of other people's children.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in graduate school working towards a PhD in Biochemistry. I hope to contribute to our understanding of Cancer and Diabetes

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I'd rather spend my money by helping people around the world than buying more stuff I don't really need.
lender.occupational_info: I write company-wide communications and announcements on behalf of the bank I work for. Additionally, I consult on company strategy and marketing.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I live in Mexico and know just a little help can make a big difference to hard working people.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because:
It's in my blood.
ianlambm@hotmail.com
lender.occupational_info: Government

lender.name: Jaclyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves. There are people in the world who were born into much more unfortunate circumstances than I. I want to take my opportunity as a more fortunate member of the human race and the global community to help those in need and that are motivated enough to better themselves and thier community.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of microfinancing and how it can truly help people out there who want to build their capacity. I know I'm fortunate to have the life I have - I'm not rich, but certainly have a decent standard of living - and I hope to be able to help others attain the same too.
lender.occupational_info: I run a theatre company and deal with the administrative end of things. It is a theatre company that aims to present innovative, challenging works that touch the heart and mind. I also assist with the curating and organisation of the Fringe Festival here with a team: we focus on a specific theme that is topical each year, and present local and international works from all genres that grapple with the issues arising from the theme.

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: I enjoy investing in people, so they can one day hopefully re-invest into other people.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I hope it will help people, who want to make a difference in their community.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by entrepreneurs, and one day be counted among them! I loan to honor another important group in my life- my awesome teaching team!
lender.occupational_info: I provide creative ideas and environments for children and the adults that love them to play and learn together. Teachers, parents, caregivers and children are my clients!

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Imagine what a difference would be made in the world if every person who could afford it gave a mere $25 to help someone less fortunate...

lender.name: Joon
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of something greater than myself.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupation: SAT Tutor and Graduate Student Hopefull
lender.loan_because: I don't think people should be held back from pursuing their business because of financial difficulty. If those with means help those without them, both parties can benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I help students in my local community prepare for the SAT exam for college admission. I ham hoping to start graduate school in January 2011 for International Relations with a focus in Economics and Development.

lender.name: The Iowa Barn Cat
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give, and all people on this planet deserve the opportunity to thrive no matter where they are from. We need to lift each other up, not tear each other down.

lender.name: SomeBrassMonkey
lender.loan_because: I loan to allow the entrepreneur to play out their vision or to help turn dreams into reality. Kiva
lender.occupational_info: I often ask myself that same question and always seem to arrive at a different answer. So, today's explanation of my work is that I with other partners operate a relatively small business which develops software for the life sciences. What does all that mean? My work with my partners mainly deals with developing software systems intended to advance medicine and science through our contribution of state-of-the-art software development.

lender.name: Chisa
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance and golden opportunity to make their dreams real.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the importance of dance and arts education and believe that the art of creating and sharing will save the world.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I believe that hard work needs to be supported and that fighting poverty is a global responsibilty that helps in the fight against terrorism and war.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired special education teacher; a former single parent with two grown children and two grandchildren.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I am the woman in the black shirt in the photo. I am giving the loans in the names of the family members you see in the photo with me (my husband, my two children, my parents and my grandmother) as part of their Christmas gifts from me.

lender.name: Hema & Subhash (HandS)
lender.loan_because: Little drops of water, make the mighty ocean! - We just try to give back by helping others the way we can.

lender.name: Althea & George
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to give back for all that has been ours over the years. We strongly believe that doing this through Kiva is a ground breaking method that will help people in need to lift them up into a more productive life

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I think microlending is a proven way to change the world for the better.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We all need each other.

lender.name: dennis
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people need help and God has given me enough to help at least a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chief in the United States Navy

lender.name: Cindy & Matt
lender.loan_because: It feels great.

lender.name: Candi
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help women in thirld-world countries. It helps them to continue their business so eventually they will be able to thrive on their own.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been the recipient of generous gifts in my life and understand just how much a simple gesture of a little money with a lot of love can change a persons world forever!
lender.occupational_info: I am a safety professional. I ensure that passengers flying on Aircraft are not only comfortable but that in the event of an emergency are safely taken care of. I make important decisions that can save peoples lives! I participate in our democracy which is my responsibility as a fortunate citizen of the United States of America. I participate in our world which is my obligation to you! Together we all can create a better world for everyone!

lender.name: Reza
lender.loan_because: Blessings from God are like rivers, they ought to flow from person to person.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: how could I not? It's easy, it seems to make a difference, and it feels good to think that I may have helped someone, particularly a woman, improve her situation. I'd be foolish not to.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I am honored to be a small part in making dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I help prevent infections in the hospital. I also work with Beads of Courage. Beads of Courage uses beads to recognize every treatment, procedure, and event that occurs to a child with cancer. It honors their courage and gives them a voice- a way to explain.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: This is an organization that teaches men and women to fish not just simply giving with no expectations.
lender.occupational_info: I build swimming pools.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because:
It's my way of showing appreciation and saying thank you to the many good people I've met during my years of travel abroad.
I like to help individuals and families become self sufficient and realize a better quality of life.
Practicing the principle of sharing helps create justice and peace in the world.
Check out: http://www.lendforpeace.org/ in the Middle East
lender.occupational_info:
I surf with dolphins.
I first read about Kiva.org in Share International magazine.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Honestly to often I waste money on things that don't matter for myself. It's nice to know for a change that that same money can be helping someone change their life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am an active duty soldier in the US Army. I work with computers. I beleive its important to give back to others regardless of your means. Theres no other feeling like it when you help someone.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I love being able to make opportunities available to people. I've received a lot in my life; it's wonderful to be able to give something back.

lender.name: Niels
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: ivo
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It is nice to find a way to impact individual lives all over the world. It is also interesting to see how people make a living
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve problems

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: Our clinic provides free medical care to children and adults in our community.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward and I enjoy helping people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Computers & Telephone worker

lender.name: Leeners Family
lender.loan_because: Give peace a chance!

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I know it is the right thing to do. I need to do more for other people, because I have been so blessed in my life. Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who have a child with autism. I help them find hope and slow down enough to feel empowered to help their child succeed and have a quality of life. I am also a Mommy and that is the best job in the whole world. I can't imagine that some children don't have their basic needs met and my husband and hope that we can help at least one child's life through these loans.

lender.name: Marque & Liane
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant waste water treatment.

lender.name: sonya
lender.loan_because: just to help

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance
lender.occupational_info: Filing papers, checking stuff so teachers get paid

lender.name: Ant√≥nio
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Don and Nancy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so much, and calls us to share those blessings with others.

lender.name: Chris and Keeleah
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: I, Keeleah, work with people with addictions and mental health issues. I, Chris, design web sites.

lender.name: tamara
lender.loan_because: I loan because we can only change the world one person at a time .But we CAN change it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother. I have 3 sons. I am a homemaker and cook.

lender.name: Sumon
lender.loan_because: Micro financing is an excellent mean/strategy to eradicate poverty as well as to boost ones' dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Satellite communications

lender.name: Lily Blain
lender.loan_because: Without help, where would we be in this world? We would become totally dependent on our selves to do everything. To cook and to clean. to push and pull. My parents have helped me have a beautiful life, so now it's my turn to help someone else in need

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: it's important to me to share what I have with others. The impact that one person can have is huge, especially if we're all working together in the same direction.
lender.occupational_info: I teach youths from 15-18 years old.

lender.name: Fiona and Les
lender.loan_because: We believe that people can help themselves if given the chance.
lender.occupational_info: We work at a Christian Hospital in Bangladesh. Les supports the director of the hospital and Fiona is a nutritionist. We are also working to support the local community and church.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like to know I'm helping somebody

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I like helping others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: moral, ethical, and economical responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I weld prototype parts for engineers. I also weld service parts for CNH.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do. ~Edward Everett Hale
lender.occupational_info: Secondary history teacher.

lender.name: UUFM-Micro
lender.loan_because:
Based on our principles, we believe in: - The inherent worth and dignity of every person - Justice, equity, and compassion in human relations - The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
We can. We should. We must.

lender.name: Suzanne and Kelly
lender.loan_because: Kelly and I loan because we can make a difference to someone's life when they don't have everything they need to live.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have been given much and need to share, not hoard, wealth. The world is really a small place, and we have to learn to be good neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I am a High School Teacher and Counsellor.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It helps, and it doesn't hurt.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching people to use computers

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. I am blessed and others need a little help.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to eduacate children about the rest of the world, the value of service, and what a small group of dedicated people can do.
lender.occupational_info: We are providing enviromentally friendly heating assistance to those that have lived a life of service and are now in need themselves.

lender.name: Sam
lender.occupational_info: Technology department of the school district. Responsible for district websites, online learning, multi-media, server management.

lender.name: Susan M
lender.loan_because: Other people have helped me, now it is my turn.
lender.occupational_info: I work with attorneys and assist them in legal research and preparation of documents.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because:
Being self-employed, I know how hard it can be to make a go of a small business. I think it's very cool to be able to help someone on the other side of the world do just that.
I thank my son for giving me this wonderful opportunity.

lender.name: louise
lender.loan_because: i want to help others.

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do by helping people in need in third-world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I like to build things from instructions, play around with computers and video games, and play with animals.

lender.name: Jen
lender.occupational_info: I teach Kindergarten children ages 3-6. I sing, laugh, and play most of my day and love it!

lender.name: Daria, Raina and Diego
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are two female medical students at BCM with a brother, a sophomore at UT Austin.

lender.name: Vijay
lender.loan_because: a small help goes a long way

lender.name: KAYA
lender.loan_because: This is (almost) more fun than buying shoes online!

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I welcome the opportunity to help others become more self sufficient.

lender.name: Keith & Debbi
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to help people.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs and deserves and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. My job is to learn. My real job is a secretary. Compared to most jobs, my job is quite easy. I sit behind a desk and answer phones and help people in need.

lender.name: Ryan Maguire
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Tamekia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals. God says that we should help our neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Armed Forces my husband also.

lender.name: Betty
lender.occupation: ESL teacher and director of non-profit
lender.loan_because: I am a believer in microfinancing and an admirer of Muhammad Yunus. I'm intrigued by Kiva's mission. I was a Peace Corps volunteer a long time ago and am a believer in the "drop in the bucket theory."
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adult immigrants. I also am the director of an immigrant non-profit organization in which 48 countries are represented.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: Abby turned 10 yrs old today and was given a $25 gift cert. so she could help somebody through Kiva. I want her to experience the thrill of "giving"

lender.name: Jojo
lender.loan_because: I want to give!

lender.name: Bhavesh
lender.loan_because: service
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Familia Huerta
lender.loan_because: "Dear friends, since God so loved us, we also ought to love one another." 1 John 4:11
lender.occupational_info: Golf Course Construction

lender.name: Juls
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the basic responsibility for those of us who are amazingly blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor who specializes in treating brain disorders.

lender.name: Emma
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer/songwriter; I write, record and perform music.

lender.name: frances
lender.loan_because: I love to give.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It is a small amount of money to me, but can make a world of difference to others around the world. Ghandi asked us to "Be the change you wish to see in the world". I want to set a good example of giving back to others for my children. They are the future.
lender.occupational_info: I am both a LightWorker who does Reiki and Energy Medicine and a Clinical Lab Scientist who performs lab tests on patients in a large hospital in California.
